page.title: 06Employment in Nailsea
page.content: By far the greater majority of people of the working population in Nailsea work outside Nailsea, mostly in Bristol. There are two small light industrial estates in Nailsea, one of which, the{West End}or{Blackfriars {Road Estate,}is in our survey area. The first firm on this site was the Blackfriars Paint Company, whose premises were built over the remains of an old coal-mine known as Grace's Pit or 60 Fathoms or,later, West End Colliery. Most of the other firms on the site are small businesses set up in the last 10 to 15 years. Two bigger firms have premises on the estate, Sonnet Kitchens and Brabantia Furniture, but these are just distribution depots. Therefore, there are not many employment opportunities on this site.
